news.title: Gregg Wallace report upholds 45 claims, including one of unwelcome physical contact
news.summary: Another three substantiated allegations against Masterchef host related to being in a state of undress.

news.title: Thames Water issues hosepipe ban for one million people across four counties
news.summary: Thames Water says a lack of rain and increasing demand has stretched its supplies.

news.title: 'Just appalling' - dubious tactics at leading estate agencies uncovered
news.summary: Undercover filming and whistleblower testimony reveals how commission is put ahead of customers.

news.title: Southend Airport to remain closed after fireball plane crash
news.summary: Eyewitnesses describe seeing the plane "bank heavily" shortly after take-off.

news.title: Man who murdered girlfriend and tried to cover up her death jailed for life
news.summary: The body of Phoenix Spencer-Horn, 21, was discovered at her home in East Kilbride in November 2024.

news.title: Woman smuggled baby into UK using fake birth story
news.summary: A baby will be placed for adoption in UK after being trafficked from Nigeria. She may never know her real parents.

news.title: Boeing fuel switches are safe, aviation authority says after Air India crash
news.summary: A preliminary investigation found the switches had been turned off in June's fatal Air India crash.

news.title: 'We want to carry on Bebe's light', mother of Southport attack victim tells BBC
news.summary: Lauren King says her daughter was "very creative" as she speaks about providing grief support.

news.title: Ex-Tory MP given community order for harassing ex-wife
news.summary: The former Bridgend MP previously denied the allegations but later changed her plea.

news.title: Post Office could be owned by its workers, government says
news.summary: The service could be turned into an employee-owned business, under options set out by the government.
